text.author: Wikinews
text.title: New faces emerge as veteran politicians step down in Hong Kong legislative election
text.summary: In the 2016 Hong Kong legislative election with a historically high turnout of 58%, the anti-establishment camp maintained its majority and veto powers, as a range of young and new candidates were elected across multiple constituencies.
